languages.text: "Какой коварной и изворотливой душонкой ты обладаешь, нелюдь. Прикидываешься, что способна испытывать чувства, пытаешься усыпить нашу бдительность. Но я все равно вижу лишь худородное отродье с холодным сердцем".
"What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."
languages.original_text: "Какой коварной и изворотливой душонкой ты обладаешь, нелюдь. Прикидываешься, что способна испытывать чувства, пытаешься усыпить нашу бдительность. Но я все равно вижу лишь худородное отродье с холодным сердцем".

traits.locale_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你的灵魂是多么狡猾、多么善变，异形。你假装拥有自己的感情，好让我们放松警惕，但我只看到一个骨瘦如柴、冷酷无情的怪物。”
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: “你的灵魂是多么狡猾、多么善变，异形。你假装拥有自己的感情，好让我们放松警惕，但我只看到一个骨瘦如柴、冷酷无情的怪物。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Votre âme est aussi sournoise que perfide, non-humain. Vous prétendez être capable de sentiments pour nous faire baisser notre garde, mais moi, tout ce que je vois, c'est une abomination rachitique au cœur de glace. »
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: « Votre âme est aussi sournoise que perfide, inhumain. Vous prétendez être capable de sentiments pour nous faire baisser notre garde, mais moi, tout ce que je vois, c'est une abomination rachitique au cœur de glace. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «La tuya es un alma artera y astuta, inhumana. Finges tener sentimientos para que bajemos la guardia. Pero yo solo veo una abominación endeble con un corazón de hielo».
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: «La tuya es un alma artera y astuta, inhumana. Finges tener sentimientos para que bajemos la guardia. Pero yo solo veo una abominación endeble con un corazón de hielo».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「なんて小賢しい魂の持ち主だ、人外め。お前は俺たちを油断させようと、感情を操れるふりをしてるんだろ。だが、俺には痩せこけた汚い冷血漢しか見えないな」
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて小賢しい魂の持ち主だ、人外め。お前は俺たちを油断させようと、感情を操れるふりをしてるんだろ。だが、俺には痩せこけた汚い冷血漢しか見えないな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Was für eine gerissene und tückische Seele Ihr doch besitzt, Unmensch. Ihr gebt vor, etwas fühlen zu können, damit wir uns in Sicherheit wiegen und nachlässig werden. Doch ich sehe nur eine dürre Abscheulichkeit mit einem kalten Herzen."
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: "Was für eine gerissene und tückische Seele Ihr doch besitzt, Unmensch. Ihr gebt vor, etwas fühlen zu können, damit wir uns in Sicherheit wiegen und nachlässig werden. Doch ich sehe nur eine dürre Abscheulichkeit mit einem kalten Herzen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

languages.text: "Ne kadar da sinsi ve vicdansız bir ruha sahipsin insan dışı. Gardımızı indirelim diye hissedebilme yeteneğine sahipmiş gibi davranıyorsun. Benim tek gördüğüm şey, buz kalpli ve sıska bir garabet."
languages.original_text: "What a sly and devious soul you possess, inhuman. You pretend to be capable of feeling so that we might lower our guard. But all I see is a scrawny abomination with a cold heart."

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar da sinsi ve vicdansız bir ruha sahipsin insan dışı. Gardımızı indirelim diye hissedebilme yeteneğine sahipmiş gibi davranıyorsun. Benim tek gördüğüm şey, buz kalpli ve sıska bir garabet."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
